import React, { useRef, useState } from "react"; import "../getuscontacted/Getuscontacted.scss"; import Button from "../../Components/Buttons/Button"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import {db} from "../../Firebase_configuration"; import { collection, addDocs } from "firebase/firestore"; export default function Getuscontacted() { const namevalue = useRef(null) const emailvalue = useRef(null) const [name, setName] = useState("") const [email, setEmail] = useState("") const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false) const handleSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() setIsLoading(true) } return (

Let's talk!

We are ready to help you.
Got a project in mind? Fill in the form or send us an email and we’ll get back to you right away!

setName(e.target.value)} value={name} required/>

setEmail(e.target.value)} value={email} required/>
